Title: Ophiocordyceps mizoramensis
Keywords:
Ophiocordyceps, Phylogenetic analysis, Polymerase chain
reaction.
Abstract:
In this study, we investigated the taxonomic identities
and phylogenetic relationships of a new species, Ophiocordyceps
mizoramensis, isolated from Mizoram using a combination of morphological
and molecular phylogenetic analysis with nuclear ribosomal DNA
sequences, including both the internal transcribed spacers (ITS1 and
ITS2) and the 5.8S gene region. The pathogenic fungus Ophiocordyceps
mizoramensis infected the host Polistes olivaceus (paper wasp) causing
death to the whole colony within the hive.

trees.title:
Ophiocordyceps mizoramensis Ml analysis using Mr
bayes
